component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.util.LocationManagerService
component.documentation: This service manage the different repository locations that can be accessed via the platform. This service is available via a EJB3 facade that is used to retrive the lis of available cores.

extension-point.name: location
extension-point.documentation:
This extension point can be used to register new repository locations (new core instances). The location registry is typically used to build the list of available servers on the first screen of the web app. The XML extension can contain a arbitrary number of location declaration if the form:
true pgsql
This extension point can be used to disable a previously declared location:
false demo
The locationURI tag must point on an existing core instance that was declared using : ...
